scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=apps/frontend & npm run type-check --workspace=apps/backend & npm run type-check --workspace=apps/shared
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=apps/frontend & npm run lint --workspace=apps/backend & npm run lint --workspace=apps/shared
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace=apps/frontend & npm run lint:fix --workspace=apps/backend & npm run lint:fix --workspace=apps/shared
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=apps/frontend & npm run test --workspace=apps/backend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage --workspace=apps/frontend & npm run test:coverage --workspace=apps/backend
scripts.quality:frontend: npm run test --workspace=apps/frontend && npm run type-check --workspace=apps/frontend && npm run lint --workspace=apps/frontend
scripts.quality:backend: npm run test:unit --workspace=apps/backend && npm run type-check --workspace=apps/backend && npm run lint --workspace=apps/backend
